sentences.sContent: Highly pathogenic avian influenza often is fatal in poultry and the H5N1 strain of the disease is spreading rapidly in some parts of the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: Highly pathogenic avian influenza often is fatal in poultry and the H5N1 strain of the disease is spreading rapidly in some parts of the world.
sentences.sCn: 高致病性禽流感对家禽来说常常是一种致命的疾病，这种疾病的H5N1病毒正在世界上某些国家迅速传播。

synos.tran: [病理][医][基医]致病的；病原的；发病的（等于pathogenetic）

phrases.pCn: 病原微生物；致病微生物

remMethod.val: path(病) + gen(产生) + ic → 能致病的 → 病原的

trans.tranCn: 致病的；病原的；发病的（等于pathogenetic）
trans.tranOther: A pathogenic organism can cause disease in a person, animal, or plant
